name: Swarm of Vampire Blossoms
description: The Swarm of Vampire Blossoms resembles a large mass of flower petals that can blend into its environment when motionless, appearing harmless.
memorable: It reduces maximum hit points of its targets, presenting a serious threat, especially to characters with limited healing capabilities.
goals: To ambush weakened foes and dominate the battlefield through its offensive and defensive capabilities.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other plant creatures or in outdoor settings rich in vegetation.
environment: Typically found in forests or overgrown areas where it can blend in with the flora.
strengths: High Dexterity allows it to evade attacks, and it has multiple resistances and immunities.
weaknesses: Low Strength makes it vulnerable to overpowering physical attacks from stronger foes.
attacks: Petal Slashes deliver dangerous slashing damage and can lower the target's maximum hit points, making them a considerable threat.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Frenzy allows it to attack with advantage against injured foes, heightening its lethality.
senses: Utilizes Blood Sense to locate nearby creatures, effectively compensating for its blindness otherwise.
skills: Has a decent perception, allowing it to sense its surroundings well.
additional_information: Immune to psychic damage, effective against mental attack users.
Resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage, enhancing its durability.
Cannot be affected by conditions such as charmed, frightened, or stunned, making it hard to control.
Swarm ability enables it to occupy the same space as other creatures.
False Appearance allows it to blend in with flower petals when stationary.
test_queries: large plant that lowers hit points
quick plant creature with blood sense
